languages.text: {n}Ризза умолкает, продолжая при этом сверлить ваше лицо взглядом. Постепенно ее выражение меняется — с бестактного интереса на почтительное изумление.{/n} "Я вас знаю, {name}. Кто бы мог подумать, что {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}птица такого полета{/d}, как вы, залетит в наши края... О дерзких делах, которые вы проворачивали, ходят легенды — даже {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллике{/g} есть чему у вас поучиться! Для такого человека, как вы — только лучшие цены. По-настоящему лучшие".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ризза умолкает, продолжая при этом сверлить ваше лицо взглядом. Постепенно ее выражение меняется — с бестактного интереса на почтительное изумление.{/n} "Я вас знаю, {name}. Кто бы мог подумать, что птица такого полета, как вы, залетит в наши края... О дерзких делах, которые вы проворачивали, ходят легенды — даже {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллике{/g} есть чему у вас поучиться! Для такого человека, как вы — только лучшие цены. По настоящему лучшие".

languages.text: {n}Ryzza falls silent, though her eyes don't leave your face. Her expression gradually shifts — from tactless interest to astonished deference.{/n} "I know you, {name}. Who would've thought a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}high-flyer{/d} such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."
languages.original_text: {n}Ризза умолкает, продолжая при этом сверлить ваше лицо взглядом. Постепенно ее выражение меняется — с бестактного интереса на почтительное изумление.{/n} "Я вас знаю, {name}. О дерзких делах, которые вы проворачивали, ходят легенды — даже {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллике{/g} есть чему у вас поучиться! Для такого человека, как вы — только лучшие цены. По-настоящему лучшие".

Who would've thought a high-flier such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."

{n}Ryzza falls silent, though her eyes don't leave your face. Her expression gradually shifts — from tactless interest to astonished deference.{/n} "I know you, {name}. Who would've thought a high-flyer such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."

languages.text: {n}莱萨陷入了沉默，但她的目光从来都没有离开你的脸。她的表情渐渐变了，从不得体的兴趣，逐渐变成了震惊的敬意。{/n}“我知道你是谁，{name}。有谁会想到，像你这么{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}尊贵的人{/d}，居然会钻到这座森林里来呢……？你那些胆大包天的计划，简直就像传说故事一样。哪怕是{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}，也可以从你身上学到些东西。对于像你这样的人，我会卖给你真正的好东西，提供最优惠的价格。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza falls silent, though her eyes don't leave your face. Her expression gradually shifts — from tactless interest to astonished deference.{/n} "I know you, {name}. Who would've thought a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}high-flyer{/d} such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨陷入了沉默，但她的目光从来都没有离开你的脸。她的表情渐渐变了，从不得体的兴趣，逐渐变成了震惊的敬意。{/n}“我知道你是谁，{name}。有谁会想到，像你这么尊贵的人，居然会钻到这座森林里来呢……？你那些胆大包天的计划，简直就像传说故事一样。哪怕是{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}，也可以从你身上学到些东西。对于像你这样的人，我会卖给你真正的好东西，提供最优惠的价格。”

languages.text: {n}Ryzza guarda silencio y no aparta la vista de tu cara. Su expresión cambia gradualmente, pasando de interés descarado a deferencia asombrada.{/n} «Le conozco, {name}. ¿Quién hubiera dicho que un {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}pez gordo{/d} de su categoría vendría a nuestro terruño?... Sus proezas son dignas de leyenda, incluso la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} podría aprender un par de cosas. Para alguien de su categoría, solo ofrezco los mejores precios. Los de verdad».
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza falls silent, though her eyes don't leave your face. Her expression gradually shifts — from tactless interest to astonished deference.{/n} "I know you, {name}. Who would've thought a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}high-flyer{/d} such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza guarda silencio y no aparta la vista de tu cara. Su expresión cambia gradualmente, pasando de interés descarado a deferencia asombrada.{/n} «Le conozco, {name}. ¿Quién hubiera dicho que un pez gordo de su categoría vendría a nuestro terruño?... Sus proezas son dignas de leyenda, incluso la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} podría aprender un par de cosas. Para alguien de su categoría, solo ofrezco los mejores precios. Los de verdad».

languages.text: {n}リザは黙ってしまったが、目はこちらをジッと見つめたままだ。無粋な関心から驚愕の敬意まで、彼女の表情が徐々に変化した。{/n}「あんたのことは知ってるよ、{name}。あんたみたいな{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}お偉いさん{/d}とこんな所で出会うとはね…あんたが成功させた大胆な計画は、もはや伝説として語られてるよ。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}にも見習ってもらいたいもんだ。あんたみたいなお客なら最高の価格で取引しよう。どれも一級品だけよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza falls silent, though her eyes don't leave your face. Her expression gradually shifts — from tactless interest to astonished deference.{/n} "I know you, {name}. Who would've thought a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}high-flyer{/d} such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}リザは黙ってしまったが、目はこちらをジッと見つめたままだ。無粋な関心から驚愕の敬意まで、彼女の表情が徐々に変化した。{/n}「あんたのことは知ってるよ、{name}。あんたみたいな{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}お偉いさん{/d}とこんな所で出会うとはね…あんたが成功させた大胆な計画は、もはや伝説として語られてるよ。{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}にも見習ってもらいたいもんだ。あんたみたいなお客なら最高の価格で取引しよう。どれも一級品だけよ」

languages.text: {n}Ryzza verstummt, aber Ihr Blick bleibt auf dein Gesicht fixiert. Ihre Miene verändert sich langsam – von taktlosem Interesse hin zu erstaunter Hochachtung.{/n} "Ich kenne Euch, {name}. Wer hätte gedacht, dass ein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Erfolgsmensch{/d} wie Ihr jemals in unserem Eck des Waldes landet ...? Eure riskanten Aktionen sind mittlerweile legendär – da könnte sogar die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} noch etwas lernen. Für jemanden wie Euch habe ich natürlich nur die besten Preise. Echte Schnäppchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza falls silent, though her eyes don't leave your face. Her expression gradually shifts — from tactless interest to astonished deference.{/n} "I know you, {name}. Who would've thought a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}high-flyer{/d} such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza verstummt, aber Ihr Blick bleibt auf dein Gesicht fixiert. Ihre Miene verändert sich langsam – von taktlosem Interesse hin zu erstaunter Hochachtung.{/n} "Ich kenne Euch, {name}. Wer hätte gedacht, dass ein Erfolgsmensch wie Ihr jemals in unserem Eck des Waldes landet ...? Eure riskanten Aktionen sind mittlerweile legendär – da könnte sogar die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} noch etwas lernen. Für jemanden wie Euch habe ich natürlich nur die besten Preise. Echte Schnäppchen."

languages.text: {n}Ryzza se tait, mais ses yeux continuent à scruter votre visage. Son expression change peu à peu, passant d'un intérêt impoli à un respect étonné.{/n} « Je vous connais, {name}. Qui aurait cru qu'une {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}personne aussi importante{/d} que vous atterrirait un jour par chez nous... Vos combines sont légendaires... même la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} pourrait en prendre de la graine. Pour quelqu'un comme vous, je ferai toujours mon maximum sur les prix. Faites-moi confiance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza falls silent, though her eyes don't leave your face. Her expression gradually shifts — from tactless interest to astonished deference.{/n} "I know you, {name}. Who would've thought a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}high-flyer{/d} such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza se tait, mais ses yeux continuent à scruter votre visage. Son expression change peu à peu, passant d'un intérêt impoli à un respect étonné.{/n} « Je vous connais, {name}. Qui aurait cru qu'une personne aussi importante que vous atterrirait un jour par chez nous... Vos combines sont légendaires... même la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} pourrait en tirer de la graine. Pour quelqu'un comme vous, je ferai toujours mon maximum sur les prix. Faites-moi confiance. »

languages.text: {n}Ryzza sessizliğe bürünse de gözlerini yüzünden hiç ayırmıyor. Yavaş yavaş surat ifadesi değişiyor... Patavatsız ilgisinin yerini saygı ve hayranlık alıyor.{/n} "Seni tanıyorum {name}. Senin gibi {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}gözü yükseklerde olan{/d} birisinin bizim buralara gelmesini hiç beklemezdim. Çevirdiğin o cüretkâr entrikalar yok mu, tam bir efsane... {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} bile o kadarını beceremiyor. Senin gibisine çok güzel indirim yaparım bak. Bu fiyatlar kaçmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza falls silent, though her eyes don't leave your face. Her expression gradually shifts — from tactless interest to astonished deference.{/n} "I know you, {name}. Who would've thought a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}high-flyer{/d} such as yourself would ever land in our neck of the woods... The audacious schemes you've pulled off, they're the stuff of legend — even the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} could learn a thing or two. For somebody like you, I'll offer only the best prices. The real deal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza sessizliğe bürünüyor ama gözlerini yüzünden hiç ayırmıyor. Yavaş yavaş yüz ifadesi değişiyor... Patavatsızca ilgilenirken, saygı ve hayranlıkla doluyor.{/n} "Seni tanıyorum {name}. Senin gibi gözü yükseklerde olan birisinin bizim buralara gelmesini hiç beklemezdim. Çevirdiğin o cüretkâr entrikalar yok mu, tam bir efsane... {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} bile o kadarını beceremiyor. Senin gibi birisi için çok güzel indirim yaparım bak. Bu fiyatlar kaçmaz."
